bug.author: Xavantex
bug.description: swagger UI changes, bug reported in swagger ui here <denchmark-link:https://github.com/swagger-api/swagger-ui/issues/6249>swagger-api/swagger-ui#6249</denchmark-link> . Should update the requirements of fastapi to latest release. Expected behavior show swagger doc To Reproduce go into the provided link of swagger documentation and click on path items

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Xavantex>@Xavantex</denchmark-link> , thank you for raising the issue. I see that that the fastapi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tiangolo/fastapi/releases/tag/0.60.1>v0.60.1</denchmark-link> has Swagger version pinned, so the Swagger UI should now be fine? If you're still facing the issue, we can pin the fastapi version in Haystack's .
yes it is fine now. I'm closing it if it's ok?
